message: Starting phase review - gathering task context and deliverables
Reviewing Phase 1 findings - checking actual deliverables versus expected
Found comprehensive investigation findings - agents did complete analysis. Now verifying if the identified missing function was actually added to state_db.py
Finalizing review - Phase 1 Investigation delivered comprehensive analysis and identified required state_db function, which was added

Phase 1 review completed - APPROVED. Investigation agents successfully analyzed JSON reads, inventoried state_db functions, identified gap (get_agent_by_id), and added the missing function. Phase advanced to Phase 2: Implementation
